## mockThemeContext variable

### mockThemeContext variable

Enables theme context mocking

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
mockThemeContext: (theme: Partial<GrafanaTheme>) => () => void
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { mockThemeContext } from '@grafana/ui';
```
